{{Translation|'''Sōshūga'''|双襲牙|lit meaning=Twin Attacking Fangs}} is the name of a fighting style employing a pair of [[Wikipedia:Nunchaku|nunchaku]] by [[Might Guy]]. Guy wields these with great dexterity, utilising all of his limbs at times, making use of them particularly during situations where direct physical contact must be avoided.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 595, pages 9-12</ref> Making use of his own impressive strength, he can even crush large boulders using this technique.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 596</ref>

== Guy's nunchaku ==
Each handle of these weapons is intricately carved into the shape of a [[Wikipedia:Chinese dragon|Chinese dragon]]-like creature, with scales engraved along their length and a head near the handle's base, while appearing to be linked together by a length of twisted cord. 

The weapons are first seen in use during the later stages of the [[Fourth Shinobi World War]] but, during the course of the confrontation with [[Tobi]], they were soon [[Kamui#Teleportation|absorbed]] by the former.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 596, page 12</ref> After the war, Guy wields a pair of nunchaku once again.<ref>''Naruto'' novel, Kakashi Hiden: Lightning in the Icy Sky</ref>  

== Trivia ==
* In episode 40 of ''[[Naruto SD: Rock Lee no Seishun Full-Power Ninden]]'', Guy can be seen holding a nunchaku with a similar looking design to the ones used for Sōshūga, but with a black colouring.
